com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.notifications

Class NotificationScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.notifications.NotificationScheduler

  • public class NotificationScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles scheduling recurring transaction notifications to be displayed on the device when the system is in the background. Notifications are displayed N days in advance as set by the user. This class uses an AlarmManager to schedule the notifications in the future.
    Author:
    Boyan Stoynov

      • schedule

        public void schedule(Recurring recurring)
        Schedules a notification to be displayed by the system for the specified Recurring Transaction. Upon pressing the notification the user is taken to the Recurring Transaction screen.
